((Ark defenses are Autoguns, Pit traps, missile defense, land mines, ice and 
fire lancers plus layered shields generators and giant saw blades.

::Lilly::
Opens the doors to Inu preach scanning the area. Seeing Number ?3 "Lets see 
here." Lilly trys to start the turbine as coughs out a cloud of black smoke 
and cuts off. "Nice work Koj." Trying the turbine yet again its starts to 
spin and Fires up shooting her off as she races across the field hitting 
about 250MPH. "HOOOOOOOWWWWWWWWW DDDDDDDDOOOOOOO IIIIII 
SSSSSSSTTTTTTTTTTTTTTOOOOOOOOOOOOPPPPPPPP!"

::?3::
"O boy" as he gets grabbed by the blue streak.

::Inu::
"You did install breaks right?"

::Koj::
"I'm not perfect I followed the blue prints. Sorry about that Lilly." Koj 
climbs on Inu

::Inu::
Grabs Lilly and 3? and heads back towards the ark.

::?5::
Standing a few meters behind Necro already getting a target lock as he 
gathers a granet of Dark Plasma. As the defense power up.

::?1::
A row of fireballs cut off Necro from coming any closer as the smoke blurs 
all of the Works keeping anyone from telling how many bots are there. "This 
is your warning leave now!"
